name: Somette_Bonded_Leather_Beli_Mont_Multi-Flex_Espresso_Futon_Frame_and_Mattress_Set
reviews: This product is definitely a great buy. I was very impressed with the quality especially since I took a chance purchasing online. The bed is extremely comfortable. The only issues is that it requires a lot of assembly and although I put it together myself, an extra hand was definitely needed.
Took awhile to put together, but love it. Haven't slept on it folded down but husband naps on it as is! Love the color!
description:
This unique and versatile full-size futon sofa set easily converts to a full-size bed. This lounger is in upholstery and espresso finish wood frame fits easily in most rooms.
Set includes: Futon Mattress, Futon FrameMaterials: WoodFinish: EspressoUpholstery materials: Bonded leather, polyester and cottonUpholstery color: SaddleUpholstery fill: Innerspring, foam and cottonFuton frame dimensions: 80 inches long x 37 inches deep x 33 inches highMonterey deck dimensions: 78 inches high x 14 inches wide x 7 inches deepMattress dimensions: 75 inches long x 54 inches wide x 8 inches highAssembly requiredMaterialCotton, Foam, Leather, WoodTypeFrame, Mattress, Sleeper Sofa, SofaFinishEspresso, WoodThickness7 InchAssemblyAssembledColorBrownFurniture PatternSolid
